title: forge官网被墙了嘛
author: 哈.
txt_content:
forge官网被墙了嘛，进不去了，想要个1.12的forge
用来搞官服mod的

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
不算被墙吧 官网服务器在国外 正常
https://c-t.work/s/744682bad5844b 上传了

replies.author: PTSD∝龌龊闵
replies.txt_content:
其实没有墙的
比如1.12.2的forge
右键复制链接
应该是https://adfoc.us/serve/sitelinks ... 7-installer-win.exe
然后你要改为https://files.minecraftforge.net ... 7-installer-win.exe
就可以下载了
